phrases: You will get in an accident.
Today, we will try running to the river in Tamagawa.
I want to determine everyone is level,
so I can plan your practice schedules for the future.
There will not be a future.
After all that, you are still participating.
You are some kind of freak, are not you?
Nothing beats eating after a run.
Is not that five kilometers away?
You are really familiar with the local geography.
Five kilometers one way means ten kilometers round trip.
Ten kilometers first thing in the morning?!
If you can shout that much after waking up, you will make it.
Where has your human dignity gone?
We are allowing ourselves to be forced to run without objection.
Can we really call ourselves people?
I beat you by a hair.
This is the first time I have wanted to go back to my home country.
First, your body needs to experience firsthand how far five kilometers is.
You will surely be able to run it.
I am going back as a butterfly.
You are not making any sense.
Is he ever going to stop running?
Your body gets cold if you just wait.
Do you understand now just how stupid your idea is?
They just ran a mere five kilometers.
Every section of the Hakone Ekiden is at least 20 kilometers.
We will have to race that distance against runners who have endured intense training.
We could practice for ten years and still be behind.
Just how insane is his body?
It will not take ten years.
After all, there is less than ten months until the race.
At universities that participate in the Hakone Ekiden,
everyone runs 5,000 meters in less than about 14:30 minutes.
We will consider that one of our goals.
I have no idea what that looks like.
The simple calculation is less than three minutes per kilometer.
One kilometer in the time it takes to prepare cup noodles?
That makes it harder to understand.
He means it is inhumanly fast.
I bet there are lots of guys like that where you are from, Musa.
My high school's long distance race was only three kilometers.
Well, that is how it is.
You are right that it is not an easy speed to achieve.
But if you do not know what your goals are, you cannot aim for them.
If you do the required training, it is different.
We will limit our focus to Hakone.
On what basis are you making those claims?
I do not want to owe any favors.
I am going to wake them.
I bet there are lots of cute girls.
We will have to ask him to take us with him.
Have not done that since grade school.
Are you a Kansei Uni student?
On the Kansei Uni track and field team?
Are you familiar with Kiyose Haiji?
I came first thing, but no one was here.
I asked him if he was on the track and field team.
I did not see anyone else who could be.
She is the daughter of the vegetable vendor in the shopping center.
A high school girl's a little too young.
Let us get back to it.
I will have to call you for help if I am ever on trial.
Can I get your number, then?
It would be hilarious if this were a scam.
Then maybe I will get your number, too.
I do not know how you can stay in there for so long.
I do not have any reason to run or anything to gain from it!
I do not need to create memories or network with you guys!
This year of freedom is my well-deserved reward!
I deserve to savor this vacation from life!
You are wasting your time by trying to convince me!
I cannot run in the Hakone Ekiden without ten members.
I do not exist for your purposes!
Naturally, I do not intend to unilaterally impose my will on you, Yuki.
After all, it is not fair to just make you accompany me.
It is very important for teammates to respect and understand one another.
I am finding a way out of this.
She is Yaokatsu's daughter, Katsuta Hanako.
She will be helping us sometimes.
so I can only help out early in the morning and late at night.
It is nice to meet you.
It is a grand sight when everyone is here.
I want to time everyone is finish.
There is no need to go crazy just because I am timing you.
I just want data to plan our practices.
That is why I am timing today's run.
I will tell Hana to keep an eye out for that.
Being forced to run is already a human rights violation,
and now he is showing off his girlfriend?
Just how much does he intend to toy with us?
But it is clear now that King has some hidden potential.
Yeah, no matter how you look at it.
I was not lying, was I?
Work hard, and women will approach you.
If you keep getting stronger and attract more attention...
We thought you were tricking us.
It is only Yaokatsu's Hana so far, but as long as we work hard...
On the other side of the road are more women than you can count!
Let us aim for the top!
You will have your hands full.
The mountains of Hakone are the steepest in the world!
I do not know what that means!
I am thinking about continuing a while longer.
How dare they be fooled so easily?!
I thought you were going to make him give up.
Do not tell me you are on board now.
So why is he so confident?
Did I do good this morning?
Athletes perform better in front of an audience.
It is effective, even if all you are doing is watching.
I hope your dream comes true.
He is been waiting four years.
You have got some good members, right?
I heard she could not keep up on her bike.
Let me know if there is anything we can do to help.
Most people only know about the actual race.
I just learned about it today.
Of the twenty schools that participate in the Hakone Ekiden,
aside from the ten seeded teams that qualify the previous year,
they have to participate in a preliminary qualifier.
Then we will race in that first.
We still do not know if we will be racing.
How many schools participate in the qualifier?
So only the top fifth qualify.
Haiji said we are just getting started.
We can do it as long as we practice hard.
How hard do you think they practice to be in the top fifth?
And not everyone can participate in the qualifier.
Each athlete needs an official record of finishing 5,000 meters in less than 16:30
You have to achieve those records before the qualifier.
It does not matter if you have a couple of fast guys.
Everyone has to be running at a high level.
An amateur who cannot even finish ten kilometers should not be aiming for that.
Do not you understand how reckless he is being?
Maybe you are worried about us,
but we are the ones doing the work, so who cares?
I do not work well with others.
We only ran together for one day.
It is been a while, Kurahara.
Next time: Shadows That Do not Fade.
